name: Little Biomes (EnneadStudios Powered by IPLeiria)
description:
Explore different environments  and learn how to preserve nature in a glass jar

Little Biomes is an Educational Exploration 3D Low-Poly game that focuses on teaching little kids to take care of the environment by completing simple puzzles to unlock new diverse Biomes. 
Follow the main character as they fix and explore the environment around them!

  • Explore a diverse universe;
  • Learn in a fun way;
  • Experience the game at your own pace;
  • enjoy the cozy art style.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls Arrow Keys - Move  Mouse - Drag and Drop

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Little Biomes is compatible with most keyboards. Little Biomes was developed in two days during the GameJam+, and will continue its development in the future!
